subtitle: I have had the opportunity to work extensively with Next.js. The framework not only simplifies the creation of dynamic, server-rendered React applications but also offers powerful features like automatic code splitting, server-side rendering, and efficient routing. Additionally, the built-in support for TypeScript and a thriving community contributed to a more maintainable and scalable codebase. Overall, Next.js has become my go-to framework for building performant and SEO-friendly web applications.

user_experience.title: User experience
user_experience.description: Crafting a positive user experience has always been the focus of my development journey.

contentful.title: Contentful
contentful.description: Creating websites that can be easy customised without touching the code base.
contentful.components: Setting up a contentful stucture that allows for creating new pages, new page components and adjusting the order of components.
